question: What was the planned hospital scene in Episode 5 supposed to show?

choices.A: Max waking up in the hospital next to Chloe's hospital bed
choices.B: Max escaping from the hospital to go get the photo from Warren
choices.C: David bringing Max to the hospital after freeing her from the Dark Room

question: What was the purpose of the unused Jefferson's Car location?
